comments: I use Eclipse 3.0M6 and cannot get Eclipse format some Java files (see stack trace below). I was not able to reproduce this bug under Windows. I insert a copy of the file that make this happen after the trace. !SESSION Jan 05, 2004 18:36:58.403 --------------------------------------------- java.fullversion=J2RE 1.4.1 IBM build See the GNU Lesser General Public License * for more details. * * You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public License * along with this library; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation, * Inc., 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA. * * Initial developer(s): Nicolas Modrzyk * Contributor(s): */ package org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.backup; import java.util.Hashtable; /** * Class to map useful values for octopus * * @author Nicolas Modrzyk * */ public final class OctopusConstants { static final int FROM_URL = 0; static final int DRIVER = 1; static final int FULL_NAME = 2; static final int PREFIX_URL = 3; static final String[] HSQL = { "hsqldb", "hsql","HypersonicSQL", "jdbc:hsqldb:" }; static final String[] CSV = { "csv", "csv", "Csv", "jdbc:relique:csv:" }; static final Hashtable TYPES; static { TYPES = new Hashtable(); TYPES.put(HSQL[0], HSQL); TYPES.put(CSV[0], CSV); } /** Get octopus type. * @param type from url * @return value from hashtable or null */ public static String getOctopusType(String type) { if(type==null) return null; return ((String[])TYPES.get(type))[FULL_NAME]; } /** Get octopus driver. * @param type from url * @return value from hashtable or null */ public static String getOctopusDriver(String type) { if(type==null) return null; return ((String[])TYPES.get(type))[DRIVER]; } /** Get Octopus url prefix * @param type from url * @return value from hashtable or null */ public static String getUrlPrefix(String type) { if(type==null) return null; return ((String[])TYPES.get(type))[PREFIX_URL]; } } --------------------------------------- END OF JAVA FILE ----------------------
This is a known bug in your JDK (see Sun's bug parade).
